review_blob: Draft serving in a pint glass.  Rated as style 10A.   Nice hop aroma - somewhat piney.  No noticeable malt aroma.  Clean, white head with fast collapse.  Golden amber color.   Balanced flavor with good hop front and finish.  Very drinkable without hop burnout.

Draft serving.  Slightly more golden than I would expect by style (2A).  Light floral nose.  Lacking in hop taste (initial and finish).  Clean head with light laciness.  Under carbonated (probaly due to serving conditions). Better serving conditions would improve the beer.
